sentence.Network_en: This movement lengthens your spine and tones the spinal nerves.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一动作舒展脊椎，使脊神经更加强健。

sentence.Network_en: I must provide security for Joe's 18 - inch spinal cord.
sentence.Network_cn: 我必须为乔的那个18英寸的脊髓提供安全保护.

sentence.Network_en: After three days in Japan, the spinal column becomes extraordinarily flexible.
sentence.Network_cn: 在日本三天, 就已经使脊椎骨变得富有弹性了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from late Latin spinalis, from Latin spina (see spine)

entry.def: Spinal means relating to your spine.

means.word_mean: 1. anesthesia of the lower half of the body; caused by injury to the spinal cord or by injecting an anesthetic beneath the arachnoid membrane that surrounds the spinal cord
1. of or relating to the spine or spinal cord;
